name: Ultra Kaiju Monster Rancher
overview: Ultra Kaiju Monster Rancher[1] (ウルトラ怪獣モンスターファーム Urutora Kaijū Monsutā Fāmu lit. "Ultra Kaiju Monster Farm") is a Nintendo Switch video game developed by Koei Tecmo and published by Bandai Namco, released on October 20, 2022. It is a crossover between the Ultraman Series and the Monster Rancher series. The game features over 200 Kaiju.
